title: (Fri Early Bird) Mailbag: Boss Thinks I’m A Snitch! + Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday: Why It’s Okay to Pee in the Pool
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Mailbag: Boss Thinks I’m A Snitch! + Easy Trivia + Fun Fact Friday: Why It’s Okay to Pee in the Pool
description:
In the mailbag, Bobby helps a listener whose boss thinks they tipped off an employee about a random drug test. We play our weekly round of Easy Trivia and in Fun Fact Friday, Bobby shares why it’s okay to pee in the pool!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
